Biology_tweet_228_r$Biology_152_r$Biolog.text:
Finding A: Could liver SIRT1 play a key role in #obesity ? This paper certainly suggests so:
Finding B: The most important discovery of this study is a human antibody that can bind to a highly conserved region of the virus common among different strains of norovirus, potentially neutralizing all GII.4 strains of norovirus that exist in nature.
Finding C: The bTBI model is capable of isolating interactions between the BBB culture and blast overpressure alone, substantially reducing the influence of inertial loading, thereby enabling precise investigation of primary blast injury.
Finding D: Whole-genome comparisons with less dominant, generalist fungi point at a significantly higher number of genes related to stress-tolerance and resource uptake in the dominant fungi, suggesting that they might be better in colonising a wide range of environments.

Biology_tweet_123_p$Biology_239_r$Biolog.text:
Finding A: The proportion of dry forest sites with seedling densities exceeding recruitment thresholds was also lower after 21st-century wildfires, declining from 49% (in sites that burned prior to 2000) to 30% (in sites burned since 2000; v 2 = 14.3, P = 0.0002).
Finding B: The researchers also found that a bacterial protein called BBK32 helps to stabilize and strengthen the bonds between the bacteria and the blood vessel wall.
Finding C: Stevenson and Rillich found that compared with the crickets treated with nitric oxide suppressing drugs which tend to fight longer and have escalated aggression, the crickets treated with nitric oxide did not fight as long nor do they have escalated violence.
Finding D: Lianas, per-unit biomass, have a much stronger competitive effect on trees than do other trees (3), and our findings appear to represent the unique effect of lianas on forest carbon dynamics and not merely the effect of biomass removal.

Finding A: Noise levels in the world\'s oceans are on the rise and this new study found that dolphins are simplifying their cal
Finding B: A significant positive correlation was recorded between the number of prey species lost and the number of large-felid species lost from a cell.
Finding C: Furthermore, we show that BAP1 inhibits tumour development partly through SLC7A11 and ferroptosis, and that cancer-associated BAP1 mutants lose their abilities to repress SLC7A11 and to promote ferroptosis.
Finding D: However, as soon as the ciliates were also allowed to evolve, protection came at a high cost to the bacteria: they then only produced few offspring.

Biology_170_p$Biology_tweet_0_r$Biology_.text:
Finding A: We conclude from these results that another socially engaged fish is the stimulus required for social orienting and that the presence of another fish that is not socially engaged is insufficient regardless of their proximity.
Finding B: New @username paper showing that birds can learn socially to recognize heterospecific alarm calls by acoustic association with known alarm calls. DOI: @username @username @username @username
Finding C: The PSEN1 inhibitor MRK-560 can target NOTCH1-mutant T-ALL, according to preclinical research. MRK-560 decreased proliferation in T-ALL cell lines and reduced #leukemia burden and increased survival in mouse models of NOTCH1-mutant T-ALL. #leusm
Finding D: Results from these confirmatory analyses provided evidence that adolescents' recent violent video game play is not a statistically or practically significant correlate of their aggressive behaviour as judged by carers.
